title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk and metal-wrapped silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, stem, satin, and half cross stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Within a curving floral border text "Create in me a clean heart, O God and renew a right spirit within me."  Then Adam and Eve with a figure of Justice and an angel.
name: Sampler
